meanings: 기분·걱정 Why don't you go see your doctor?
약국에서 If the pain persists, please go see your doctor.
약국에서 If the symptoms are still there, consult your physician.

vlive.korean: 병원 가. You'll end up in the hospital. 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 코니들의 본격 야식 권장방송
vlive.english: You'll end up in the hospital.

vlive.korean: 여기가 당겨서 너무 아파요. 내일 아침에 일어나자마자 병원 가보려고요. It hurts a lot. I'm going to go to the hospital as soon as I wake up. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 피부관리 같이 해요! [Let's play skincare with Chamomile_T]
vlive.english: It hurts a lot. I'm going to go to the hospital as soon as I wake up.

vlive.korean: 뭐야~? 병원가. Why ? - You should go to hospital. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : MATILDA - 마틸다 '여름을 준비하는 마틸다의 올바른 자세는?'
vlive.english: Why ? - You should go to hospital.

vlive.korean: 유리애 씨가 있던 병원 가봅시다. Let's go to the hospital you were at. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 1화 - 오빠를 찾아주세요.
vlive.english: Let's go to the hospital you were at.

vlive.korean: 어디 가볼까요? - 병원 가볼까요? Where to next? - How about the hopsital? 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 '블루미 상담실'
vlive.english: Where to next? - How about the hopsital?

examples.korean: And I didn’t think any more of it, right, but Mum says I should see a doctor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래서 난 그것에 대해 더 이상 생각 안 했지, 그런데 말야, 엄마께서 나더러 병원에 가 봐야 한다는 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: And I didn’t think any more of it, right, but Mum says I should see a doctor. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I need to see a doctor.’ ‘What for?’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook ‘난 의사한테[병원에] 가 봐야 해.’ ‘왜?’ Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I need to see a doctor.’ ‘What for?’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you’re passing blood you ought to see a doctor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만약 피가 나오면 병원에 가 봐야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you’re passing blood you ought to see a doctor. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’d better go to the doctor about your cough. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 너 그 기침 때문에 병원에 가 보는 게 좋을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’d better go to the doctor about your cough. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If the symptoms persist, consult your doctor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 증상이 없어지지 않고 계속되면 의사에게[병원에] 가 보세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the symptoms persist, consult your doctor. Add to Wordbook
